snippet: Hungary's government plans to submit a law on the way non-governmental organizations operate next week, two sources with knowledge of the matter told Reuters on Thursday, raising concerns about a crackdown on dissenting groups....

headline.main: UK Banks Need to Build Operations in EU Post-Brexit-ECB
headline.print_headline: UK Banks Need to Build Operations in EU Post-Brexit-ECB

lead_paragraph: Hungary's government plans to submit a law on the way non-governmental organizations operate next week, two sources with knowledge of the matter told Reuters on Thursday, raising concerns about a crackdown on dissenting groups.
